Articles.Content:
Hi gang!

I know this is passe, trite, and done-to-death, but I have done a Apollo 11 style mission, with proper CSM and LEM.

Mechjeb was included if needed, however was only used for initial ascent.

Mission went without a hitch, did a no-instrument suicide burn and vert speed zeroed 21m off surface: cut it a little close!

Forgot to put solar panels on the LEM, so it was a brief stop (batteries running flat) before a successful rendezvous and return to KSC.

Craft was stock (apart from Mechjeb) and was built without noclip.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

To anyone wondering what happened with the separator in the 'stage 3 separates' pic, it was weird: undocking seemed to annul the velocity of the separator which whizzed off, shortly followed by the tank. I switched to it, and found it was 0.0ms relative to the Mun. Weird.

Edited July 18, 2014 by kahlzun
